name: checkout-api
notes: The Checkout API lets you create Square-hosted checkout webpages where your customers can pay for goods and services. Accept itemized payments on a Square-hosted webpage, no frontend experience required

endpoints.name: Create checkout
endpoints.notes: Links a checkoutId to a checkout_page_url that customers are directed to in order to provide their payment information using a payment processing workflow hosted on connect.squareup.com.
